use.flag: Enable support for network protocols (POP, IMAP and SMTP). If you only need to send mail with the local Transport Agent, disabling this will get you support for only /usr/sbin/sendmail call.
If network is enabled, this adds support for S/MIME and SSL/TLS-powered protocols through dev-libs/openssl.
If network is enabled, this adds support for GSSAPI login on IMAP through virtual/kerberos.
